markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wyrmling Flight](/Feats.aspx?ID=2392) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 39 <sup>3.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Hatchling Flight](/Feats.aspx?ID=2389)

</column>

---

Your draconic wings have grown large and strong enough for flight. You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed, using your wings to stay aloft.
name: Wyrmling Flight
